name: A1. Prefix Flip  Easy Version
statement:
There are two binary strings a and b of length n (a binary string is a
string consisting of symbols 0 and 1). In an operation, you select a
prefix of a, and simultaneously invert the bits in the prefix (0 changes
to 1 and 1 changes to 0) and reverse the order of the bits in the
prefix.For example, if a=001011 and you select the prefix of length 3,
it becomes 011011. Then if you select the entire string, it becomes
001001.Your task is to transform the string a into b in at most 3n
operations. It can be proved that it is always possible.
